content:
Job Description

Coding Logics Ltd is in the process of hiring a Jnr PHP developer who must have previous experience with both Codeigniter & Laravel.

NOTE: Please read the job description carefully and only apply if you have expertise and the relevant experience, we are not looking for a fresh graduate or someone with less than 2 years experience so only apply if you fit the requirements perfectly otherwise kindly do not waste your and our time, your skills will be tested in the interview. Only apply if you are willing to travel or relocate to Gulraiz Phase 2, Rawalpindi as that is where we are located and you will be working at. We are looking for a developer who can join us as of immediately so this is a perfect opportunity for somebody who is available and looking for a fresh start.

Skills Required:PHP, Codeigniter, Laravel, MySQL, HTML, Javascripts

Job Description

1. Deployment and integration knowledge with servers like Linux/Wamp/Xamp

2. Comfortable with Cpanel and cloud server setup

3. Professional development experience in Laraval including (PHP/MYSQL Rest Api`s)

4. Experience with adding/installing php extensions and dll files.

5. Have successfully completed at least 2 live web application using Laravel Framework. Have successfully completed at least 2 live web application using Codeigniter Framework.

6. Architecture and design is important to us. Must have strong basic concepts of OOP, Data structure, Database and Algorithms.

7. Must have strong framework knowledge (Codeigniter and Laravel)

Programming Languages PHP 5.6 and PHP 7

8. Databases, MySQL Interface Protocols & Standards, Web Standards
�� �
9. Frameworks MVC, Laravel and CodeIgniter.

content:
Job Description

The Unity3D developer works on a small team to design, develop, and maintain a thin game client using C# .net in the Unity3D Game Engine. Must be experienced with Unity GUI, Object Oriented Design principles, asset bundles, and script writing in C#.

The Unity3D engineer will also interact with other teams such as the game server team, art department, and the web team. The engineer must be a team player and work well in a collaborative environment. If you are the best at what you do we want to hear from you! . Must have an experience in integrating ad mob

NOTE: if you have developed at least five games then you may apply..
Freshers do not apply

Job Description

Strong knowledge of object oriented design, design patterns, 3D Math, and data structures.
• Expert knowledge of Unity3D Pro including Unity GUI, asset bundles, materials/shaders, and iPhone deployment.
• Graphics Development (Particle Systems, Shaders).
• Must have shipped at least one game to the App Store.
• Strong knowledge of C# and the .net framework 2.0 or above.
• Ability to work on fixed deadlines.
Experience with OSX, iOS, and/or Mono
• Experience publishing to Android.
• Experience with Visual Studio and/or Team Foundation Server
• Asset Server
title: Unity 3D Game Developer

content:
Job Description

Business Development Officer (Local Sales):
We are an IT company that have been in business for over 4 years - working on Graphics Designing, Website and Mobile App development, Software solutions Development and Online marketing. We have so far been working in International market (US, UK, Canada, Australia etc.). We are now looking to induct resources to penetrate into the local market (Karachi) for all the services that we offer
-We require a young and dynamic candidate for developing our business in local market.
-Ideal candidate would be presentable, with great communication and interpersonal skills. Should be well-versed with Emailing, MS-Office and communicating in English.
-Should have a bachelors degree (preferably in Computer Science but not mandatory)
-Should be having understanding of IT Softwares, Websites, Mobile apps and Online marketing.
-Minimum 6 months of experience in selling IT services is required.
-Candidate should have their own conveyance.

Salary payout ranges between 18k - 35k, depending upon skills and expertise. Excellent commission structure and yearly Bonus offered, 5 Days a week working.
